about.title: About Us
paragraphs: Welcome to our Case Converter website, your one-stop destination for intuitive text transformation tools. Built by a small team of passionate developers and writers, this site was created to streamline how you edit and prepare text for everything from research papers to social media posts.

Over the years, we noticed people repeatedly searching for quick utilities to convert their text. Rather than juggling multiple sites with intrusive ads and inconsistent interfaces, we imagined a single, cohesive platform. Every feature you see here was inspired by real workflows across writing, research, and engineering.

Our commitment to continuous improvement means that we listen carefully to user suggestions. When another user requested support for international languages, we added selectors and ensured our code properly handles accented characters and right-to-left scripts.

Beyond the features themselves, we care deeply about presentation. Our dark theme reduces eye strain, and responsive design ensures the interface looks great everywhere. Buttons and controls are thoughtfully spaced for touch and pointer devices alike.

As we look ahead, our roadmap includes more tools, rich import/export options, and collaboration features. Simplicity, privacy, and respect for your time will always guide us. Thank you for choosing our website and for sharing your suggestions with us.

sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect
body: We do not require you to create an account to use the core functionality. We may collect certain information automatically when you visit the website.
Usage data such as pages visited and interactions, technical data like browser type and device, and ad-related data from third-party partners may be collected.
Any text you input into the case converter tool is processed only to perform the conversion operation. We do not intentionally use this content to personally identify you.

sections.heading: 2. Cookies and Similar Technologies
body: We use cookies and similar technologies to operate and improve the Service and to support advertising. You can control or delete cookies through your browser settings.

sections.heading: 3. Advertising (Google Ads / AdSense)
body: We display advertisements using Google Ads / AdSense and possibly other partners. These partners may use cookies to serve and measure ads based on your visits.

sections.heading: 4. How We Use Your Information
body: We use the information we collect to operate, maintain, and improve the Service; monitor usage and performance; protect against fraud; and display and measure ads.

sections.heading: 5. Third-Party Services and Links
body: Our website may contain links to other websites and may use third-party services. These third parties have their own privacy policies, and we are not responsible for their practices.

sections.heading: 6. Data Retention
body: We retain usage and analytics information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

sections.heading: 7. Children's Privacy
body: Our Service is not directed to children under the age of 13 (or the equivalent age in your region), and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

sections.heading: 8. Security
body: We take reasonable measures to protect the information we collect. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

sections.heading: 9. Your Choices and Rights
body: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal data, such as access, correction, deletion, or objection to certain processing. Contact us to exercise these rights.

sections.heading: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last updated" date.

advertising.intro: This Advertising Policy explains how ads are displayed on our case converter website, how advertisers may interact with the platform, and how users can understand or control their ad experience.

sections.heading: 1. Use of Advertising
body: Ads support hosting, maintenance, and ongoing development. Ads may appear in banners, inline placements, or responsive ad blocks.
Advertisements may be served by third-party providers such as Google Ads / Google AdSense or other approved ad networks.

sections.heading: 2. Third-Party Advertising Partners
body: We use third-party vendors to display ads. These vendors may use cookies, device identifiers, or similar technologies to collect information about your visits.
These technologies help advertisers display relevant ads, measure campaign effectiveness, and limit how often a specific ad is shown.

sections.heading: 3. Types of Ads We Display
body: Examples include text-based ads, display banners, responsive units, and non-intrusive interest-based ads. We do not allow pop-ups, misleading ads, malware, or disruptive formats.

sections.heading: 4. Sponsored Content
body: Sponsored content is clearly marked and must comply with our quality and safety standards.

sections.heading: 5. Data Collection Related to Ads
body: Advertising partners may collect device information, IP address, clicks and ad interaction metrics, and navigation behavior to improve relevancy and prevent abuse.

sections.heading: 6. User Control Over Ads
body: Users may be able to opt out of personalized ads through device or browser settings, ad network opt-out links, or Google Ads personalization settings. Disabling personalized ads may result in less relevant advertising.

sections.heading: 7. Restrictions on Advertisers
